io.nflow.engine.workflow.definition

Class WorkflowDefinition<S extends Enum<S> & WorkflowState>

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.nflow.engine.model.ModelObject
      • io.nflow.engine.workflow.definition.AbstractWorkflowDefinition<S>
        • io.nflow.engine.workflow.definition.WorkflowDefinition<S>
  • Type Parameters:
    S - The enumeration of valid workflow states.
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ActionStateVariableWorkflow, BulkWorkflow, BusinessKeyWorkflow, ConstantWorkflow, CreditApplicationWorkflow, CreditDecisionWorkflow, CronWorkflow, DeleteHistoryWorkflow, Demo2Workflow, DemoWorkflow, FibonacciWorkflow, ForeverWaitingWorkflow, NoDelaysWorkflow, NoRetryWorkflow, ProcessCreditApplicationWorkflow, SimpleWorkflow, SlowWorkflow, StateWorkflow, WithdrawLoanWorkflow, WordGeneratorWorkflow

    public abstract class WorkflowDefinition<S extends Enum<S> & WorkflowState>
extends AbstractWorkflowDefinition<S>
    The base class for enum based workflow definitions.
